name: What Its Like To Be 20 (#GM20 Jam)
name_original: What Its Like To Be 20 (#GM20 Jam)
description:
This is a story game where you go around with your older brother seeing what it's like to be 20 for a day.

Made in 1 week for the #GM20 Jam.

CONTROLS:

W,S,A,D - to move

F - to interact

SPACE - shoot (while in car)
